thread.title: Hillary Clinton's testimony before the Benghazi Committee, in gifs
thread.title_full: Hillary Clinton's testimony before the Benghazi Committee, in gifs - CNNPolitics.com

author: Brenna Williams
title: Hillary Clinton's testimony before the Benghazi Committee, in gifs
text:
With all due respect to the many different examinations of Hillary Clinton's expressions during her testimony before the House Select Committee on Benghazi, it is a story best told in GIFs, which were begging to be named.
Also, if you want to find out what actually happened at the hearing, find out at CNN .
